msg: Added support for setting HttpConnection local address.

msg: Fixed some checkstyle violations.  Removed tab characters, reformatted, etc.

author: olegk
msg: - HttpConnectionManager is now a property of the HttpClient class, not of the

author: olegk
msg: Bug fix #19235 (Problem with redirect on HEAD when (bad, naughty) server returns body content)
- HttpExcption is thrown in the strict mode when chunk-encoded body has been declared with 'Transfer-Encoding' header but not sent.

- Per default HttpClient does not check for presence of HTTP HEAD response body. Such check can be optionally activated on an individual HEAD method when necessary. In the strict mode presence of a content body in response to HTTP HEAD request will cause an HttpException to be thrown.

author: mbecke
msg: Removed dependencies on JSSE and JCE so that maven will compile.  This is
only a temporary fix until JSSE and JCE are re-added to maven.
